content: *this pattern has been one of my most popular ones - thank you all for loving it so much --- this basic hat in 2 x 2 rib is very stretchy so will fit a large range of sizes it offers a choice of a plain ribbed or a double-sided cable fold-over brim having the cable ribbing double-sided gives the wearer the option of not folding the brim over and wearing this hat with a touch of slouch **yarn** **each** hat requires 255 yds / 234 m aran-weight yarn samples in mission falls 1824 wool 100% merino superwash wool 85 yds / 78 m per 50g / 1 75 oz in colour 002 **needles** 4 mm / us6 circular needle 16 / 40 cm **and** a set of 4 double pointed needles note this hat can easily be knit using traveling loop 2 magic loop or 2 circs but separate instructions are not included **notions** stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends **method** knit in the round from the bottom up **online resources** traveling single loop a method for using a longer circular needle to knit a smaller circumference object http //impeccableknits wordpress com/traveling-loop/ 3 **our commitment to you** our team strives to present you with a pattern that is accurate complete and enjoyable we know however that sometimes our best efforts are not enough and errata may slip through for this we sincerely apologize if we have overlooked a detail or you have any questions or comments please write us at patternsupport at impeccableknits dot ca we re always happy to help **in support of hand knitters and entrepreneurs** being a small business ourselves we encourage entrepreneurship in hand-knitters who would like to sell items personally hand knit from our patterns whether for charity or personal profit if you would like to acknowledge the pattern s source and / or designer then we thank you for your generosity we wish you much success *the impeccable knits team* ~~~~~ *august 2014 update an new version of this pattern was published today but the changes to the pattern were cosmetic only you may knit from the previous version with confidence * 1 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/impeccable-knitters-gathering-place/pages/technique-travelling-loop-or-single-loop 3 https
